scripts.dev: concurrently -n "SERVER,FRONTEND,SHOPEE,LAZADA" -c "blue,green,yellow,magenta" "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:shopee" "npm run dev:lazada"
scripts.install:workspaces: npm install --workspace=server && npm install --workspace=bva-frontend && npm install --workspace=shopee-clone && npm install --workspace=lazada-clone
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=server && npm run build --workspace=bva-frontend && npm run build --workspace=shopee-clone && npm run build --workspace=lazada-clone
